extractions.outcome: The amount of saturated fat in the foods purchased
extractions.intervention: fully automated advice that recommended specific switches from selected products higher in saturated fat to alternate similar products lower in saturated fat
extractions.comparator: control received general non-specific advice about how to eat a diet lower in saturated fat
